Reviews.Title: MY VERY OWN 24/7 WATCHMAN
Reviews.Author: TONY SOPRANO
Reviews.Content: Yes just like the title saids I now have my very own 24/7 watchman and this guy never complains and most important never ever lies to me now can I can leave the house and know I'm very well protected.this security system is very easy to set up,the most important thing to do is make sure all your cameras work before setting them up them make sure the camera cable that comes  with it is enought for your application and if every thing is good just set up and feel that your home is safe because if anything does happend you can always go back and check your security system,this security system is so easy to set up even a 10 year old can set it up nice and easy the way life should be.I would recommend this to all my friends.
